attributes.action: utilise  Commercial Catering suppliers to provide support to  supermarkets
attributes.additional_details:
These businesses are currently closing and laying staff off 
They have all of the systems required to be up and running in 24/48hrs
attributes.background: Make use of all of the food that is no longer needed for Restaurants and Pubs to increase supply and support for Supermarkets etc

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This would be a matter for supermarkets and suppliers.
